The Technical Proficiency competency program is designed to help sellers understand service integration and how to describe the resulting value to a customers by bridging the strategic and transformational potential of our offerings. This will result in more meaningful conversations with customers about the solutions that can address the business challenges they face.

b98a1c6a-7809-4c14-8a92-56b9f8bb092c.description: GetStarted was built for AWS sellers and can apply to anyone who is a seller and needs foundational cloud knowledge. This course introduces the fundamentals of Cloud Computing to the field with a specific focus on AWS messaging, foundational persona conversations, and strategies to pass your CPC Exam.
b98a1c6a-7809-4c14-8a92-56b9f8bb092c.name: Technical Proficiency - GetStarted

issuer.summary: issued by AWS WWRO Worldwide Field Enablement

badge_template_activities.title: This training is for internal AWS employees only.

94a61b1e-4cc8-41cf-8c2f-cb32c5281ef7.description: GetFocused is the new and improved Focus 40. It was designed to help sellers understand service integration and how to describe the resulting value to a customers by bridging the strategic and transformational potential of our offerings. This will help sellers drive better, more meaningful conversations with customers about the outcomes that can be achieved to address the many business challenges our customers face.
94a61b1e-4cc8-41cf-8c2f-cb32c5281ef7.name: Technical Proficiency - GetFocused

issuer.summary: issued by AWS WWRO Worldwide Field Enablement

3a1b0cee-8877-46df-82ef-148055c37f04.description: Our sellers are able to relate industry trends to customer's business drivers, qualify industry-specific workloads opportunities, communicate industry solutions offerings, connect business value to AWS capabilities, and articulate how these capabilities can positively impact customers.
